scripts.build_mathjax: npm run --silent clone; cd mathjax && npm i && npm run compile && npm run make-components
scripts.build_mathjax_for_debug: npm run --silent clone; cd mathjax && npm i && npm i --save source-map-support; gsed -i 's/module.exports = PACKAGE;/module.exports = function (name, mathjax, libs, dir, dist) { const config = PACKAGE(name, mathjax, libs, dir, dist); config["devtool"] = "inline-source-map"; return config };/' components/webpack.common.js && npm run compile && npm run make-components
scripts.build: npm run build_mathjax && cd src && node ../mathjax/components/bin/makeAll
